website_summaries.verdict: Suction cups stick well to both glass and plastic and are perfect for stemless wine glasses, as well as tall drink glasses.
pros: Suction cup charms are easy to attach to any glass, perfect for those who prefer a stemless wine glass
Set comes with a variety of comical and detailed emoji faces
Charms can easily be stored on the side of your fridge for quick access
Also works well on plastic cups
cons: Emojis are larger than they appear in the photos

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how long these will last but I brought them to a casual party as a hostess gift and they were a hit with adults and kids alike. My friends had fun picking out an emoji to use and liked knowing which glass was whose. The kids got jealous of us and put them on their juice cups. They stick very well. Perhaps a little too well...I sometimes found it a little difficult to remove. They are bigger than expected but that makes them easier to spot and easier to remove. Overall, a great, inexpensive gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Maven

customer_reviews.title: Not all different
customer_reviews.text: These stuck to the glasses easily and were cute, but I did NOT receive 12 different emojis as is shown in the pictures. Several were repeated 2 or 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: These emojis were absolutely adorable!! I would definitely buy some more as hostess gifts.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: People thought these were hilarious and really fun during our camping trip. I was sticking them to plastic short, disposable wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor Weber

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are super cute and creative! The suction is pretty good, I've only tried using it on a one type of glass so far. They are a little bit smaller than a quarter.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ash

customer_reviews.title: They are great, worked for what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on a wine tasting birthday trip. They were a big hit. Only bummer is that the poop one was the Birthday girl’s favorite and we couldn’t find it anywhere the next day ☹️
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This was a add on gift for a bridal shower, so I never opened it. But it came exactly how the picture showed it. Each piece looked exactly like the picture and were bigger then I thought they would be. Bride loved them !
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for being able to tell kids glasses apart! Great for cutting down on dishes!
customer_reviews.author: KGood

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Fun
customer_reviews.text: It is great because it can be used on stemless glasses. Everyone Had a lot of fun at our last gathering with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good size, not tiny. I used for Thanksgiving and they worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for non stem glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very useful especially if you are not using stem glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Super Savvy 🐐

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I used them for any dinner parties I've thrown and it's a hit with EVERYONE! They stick on glasses and even plastic cups for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Devi0us

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, so I'm not sure how they will hold up, but they are soooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't stick :-(
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about using this for our party as the emojis are very cute. Unfortunately, it doesn't stick and keeps falling off. Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these emoji markers!!!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are so fun for parties with friends! We all enjoy picking our emoji and the suction cups are a great way to keep them on the glass!
customer_reviews.author: Shellpurplelover

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: We hosted some parties, and these were a hit! Not only do they help distinguish everyone’s drink glasses, they were so much fun with the different emojis.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Q

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay on glasses OR cans. The suction sucks. 😄
customer_reviews.author: JodieLU

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Don’t swap germs and mark your cup!in a fun way!
customer_reviews.text: So fun for making sure we don’t mix up drink glasses! I use them on my kids’ drink cups too. My son loves to choose who gets to be the poop emoji.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good service. Now if I can just get everyone to use them!
customer_reviews.author: judy eyges

customer_reviews.title: Items not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The item says 12 pieces, but there were only 2 in an open package. Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: They are great for stemless wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at our Thanksgiving affair. They are great for stemless wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These have been SO helpful for when we have guests or my son has friends over (or even for when it’s just me and my son and I can’t remember if that cup was mine!). They stick well to multiple types of cups and glasses, and they’re fun too- it’s fun to see who picks what and why! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: These work great. We use them on regular cups and glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. We use them on regular cups and glasses so that my kids are not grabbing multiple glasses throughout the day and getting them mixed up.
customer_reviews.author: shoeshopper

customer_reviews.title: They were a hit! Received exactly what was described!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. Got them as an add on gift 4a friend who hosts our girls night in gatherings & she uses wine glasses without a stem so it had 2b specifically 4any glass which can be difficult 2find. They were a hit! As soon as she opened her gift everyone grabbed the 1 they wanted like I just busted a pinata open! We all stuck 1 on our glass & they never fell off once the whole night. Only downside was that they came in a cheap little baggy not good as a gift so I bought some little mesh gift bags from amazon & it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: These emoji glass charms are adorable! They stick well to the glass too
customer_reviews.text: These emoji glass charms are adorable! They stick well to the glass too. They make for great hostess gifts. I bought 3 packs so I always have a hostess gift on hand in case of an emergency! Friends will love the cute faces!!
customer_reviews.author: Tksharp1

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: so much fun that my grandkids wanted to take them and keep on their glasses. they stuck pretty good to the cups, glasses and even stuck to them after washing the cups, glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Rosina

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit at my last party
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Will be buying for the holidays. Perfect gift for anyone who likes to entertain. The suction cups stay put all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: they serve their purpose in a fun way!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect them to be as large as they are, but they're really cute, and the suction cup stays on all day. More importantly, they serve their purpose in a fun way!
customer_reviews.author: daddys3rd1075

customer_reviews.title: Fun on a Glass!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glass markers! First time use - everyone was trying to find their favorites before another person could get it. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite over all purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love the, went over well with children in the family, who kept the as gifts..I will be ordering replacement
customer_reviews.author: ILIKEBlue

customer_reviews.title: I think that will almost work better.
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were magnets but they are suction cups. I think that will almost work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: As cute as they look! A great size and cool faces. Everyone in the family is keen to use these, so we can finally keep our own glass now
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups not secure
customer_reviews.text: Many of these charms had loose suction cups on the back, and a couple even fell off completely. Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It stays on the wine glass and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun and Funky :-) and stick very well to glasses, and plastic as well.
customer_reviews.author: SEA SHELL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they work great on glass! very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

product_meta.title: MelonBoat Poop Unicorn Emoji Wine Charms for Glasses, Universal Drink Markers with Suction Cup, 12 Pack
product_meta.description:
Color:Funny face 12Specifications: 
Color: Yellow ; Material: Silicone
Size: 1 inch ; Weight: 20g 

Features: 
It's so durable and stick well to non-porous flat surfaces like glasses, mirrors and stainless steel.
You can pick out the emoji marker that best fits your mood. 

Notes: 
If suction did't stick well,please wet it.That will help

Customer Services: 
If you are not 100% happy with your purchase, we would offer you a replac好ement or 100% Money Back.

Package includes: 
12 different moods in a package
feature_bullets: Distinguishing everyone's drinks. 12 different adorable emoji markers are molded in silicone.
The suction cup are durable and stick well to non-porous flat surfaces like glasses, mirrors windows and stainless steel.
You can pick out the emoji marker that best fits your mood.
Unique wine glass markers make a memorable impression at any event.
Perfect for hostess, housewarming, birthday gifts, wedding presents, Christmas, emoji party, holiday gifts for friends or neighbors.
